alert.note: Alert for South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 3:49PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Benton and west central Linn Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 348 PM PDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Corvallis, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corvallis, Albany, Tangent and North Albany. This includes the following highways in Oregon... Interstate 5 between mile markers 223 and 231. U.S. Highway 20 west of Corvallis between mile markers 54 and 56. U.S. Highway 20 from Corvallis to Albany between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
